errors.fetch-failure: Failed to fetch backend information. Please ensure you are logged in on Wplace.
errors.fetch-failure-title: Unable to fetch information from Wplace.

footer.disclaimer: This site is not affiliated with Wplace whatsoever. Its sole purpose is to have a readable version of the JSON that can be found in the backend.

suspension-reason.inappropriate-content: inappropriate content (adult content, inappropriate link, highly suggestive content...)
suspension-reason.hate-speech: hate speech (racism, homophobia, promotion of a hate group...)
suspension-reason.doxxing: releasing one's private information (address, phone number...) without their consent
suspension-reason.griefing: messing up an artwork that wasn't griefable (such as a country/sexual orientation flag, a character from a media franchise...)
suspension-reason.other: a reason only the reporter and GMs know

account-status.banned: You have been banned from Wplace for {reason}.
